name: Alarm Spotlight
author: Alucard648
description: An spotlight, which, if stepped in, plays alarm sound, change all CT_ALARM_SHUTTER combos to next in table and drops enemies from ceiling.If spawned enemies are defeated, secrets open.
setup: Requires ghost.zhPlace FFC the spotlight should start. Move it with FFC settings and changers. D0 - ID of spawned enemies  D1 - number of spawned enemies D2 - >0 - secrets unlocked, when spawned enemies are killed.
